name: Who's afraid of White Red and Black?
name_original: Who's afraid of White Red and Black?
description:
Who's afraid of White Red and Black?

It is recommended to dowload the Game! On a few PC's we've noticed issues with the WebGL version that we haven't fixed yet. Thanks for your understanding.

An educational experimental game about spacial perception for the ETH Zürich. Project by Architect Team Archiduckture.

This is our first game and you are very welcome to leave any feedback! :)

PS: the game is finish at level 3 at the white cube!
